message: Let's be fair. 90% for me, 10% for you. I think this is a reasonable starting point.
Alice, your offer was quite bold. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. Consider that in the next round, the money will be worth less due to inflation.
Okay, Bob. I understand your perspective.  Let's compromise.  I'll take a 60% share, you take 40%.  This way, we both get something reasonable, and we don't have to worry about further inflation.
